title: Wild Card Weekend recap
itunes:title: Wild Card Weekend recap
description:
A room filled with heroes – Colleen Wolfe, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling, and Marc Sessler – go game-by-game breaking down all the action from the first round of the playoffs, including the Seahawks and Vikings facing off in frigid Minneapolis temperatures in a game that ended with a missed field goal, and propelled Seattle to the divisional round. Plus, the heroes recap the Chiefs dominant shutout performance against the Texans, and celebrate the return of the Wesstivus season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
